Question
========

The game of throw the dice uses two pure dice, one die consisting of six faces and the other die consists of sixteen faces. How many possible outcomes exist in the outcome space?

Answerlist
----------

* 24
* 36
* 54
* 96

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 24:Incorrect
* 36: Incorrect
* 54: Incorrect
* 96: Correct
